Headline: #95 95th & #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 95th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: Eastbound #95 95th & #112 Vincennes/111th buses temporarily rerouted via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette and 95th, due to police activity near 95th/Wentworth

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th & #112 Vincennes/111th buses temporarily rerouted via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette and 95th, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near 95th/Wentworth.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ashland/88th
ShortDescription: NB #9 Ashland buses are temp rerouted via Leaving the 95th Beverly terminal, Eastbound to Vincennes, 87th & Ashland, due to police activity near Ashland/88th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Leaving the 95th Beverly terminal, Eastbound to Vincennes, 87th and Ashland, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near Ashland/88th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
